actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to establish special asset reserve requirements for all financial institutions to maintain a fund from which moneys may be drawn for the purpose of purchasing mortgages.

summary.text: Establishes, under the Federal Reserve Act, special asset reserve requirements for all financial institutions. States that such reserves are to be used to maintain a fund from which moneys can be drawn for the purchase of mortgages.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to establish special asset reserve requirements for all financial institutions to maintain a fund from which moneys may be drawn for the purpose of purchasing mortgages.
